import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import css from "@emotion/css"; import { Formik } from "formik"; import * as Yup from "yup"; import Cookies from "js-cookie"; import { useSnackbar } from "react-simple-snackbar"; import { COLORS } from "../../../constants"; import * as STYLES from "../../../components/General/modalStyles"; import FormInput from "../../General/formInput"; const WorkshopModal = ({ openModal }) => { return ( Workshop Details
); }; export default WorkshopModal;
